name: Cruel
entries: The challenges and struggles you've faced have led you to delight in inflicting pain and anguish upon others.
You gain a number of cruelty dice equal to your proficiency bonus. Your cruelty dice are {@dice d6}s. You can roll only one cruelty die per turn, and a cruelty die is spent when you roll it.

items: When you deal damage to a creature, you can spend one cruelty die to deal extra damage to that creature equal to the number rolled.
When you score a critical hit, you can spend one cruelty die to gain temporary hit points equal to the number rolled.
When you make a Charisma ({@skill Intimidation}) check, you can spend one cruelty die and add the number rolled to the check.

entries: You regain all expended cruelty dice when you finish a long rest.
